availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cynthiana, Kentucky, merchant and clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Hetty Wilson. Married to Sallie T. Williams in Harrison County, Kentucky, on March 10, 1858. Father of Henry Wilson and George Wilson. Clerk in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Cynthiana in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Cynthiana in 1860. Household owned an additional two enslaved persons in Cynthiana in 1860. Clerk in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana p. 190B.
